reviews.text: Situated in the heart of city.Awesome place to hangout with friends. Friends can sit together for long time . Burgers are awesome in taste. All food items are good in taste.
Love to come here, after my coaching classes. It is very nice place for sitting with friends
Well !!!! Who doesn’t know abt Mcdonald 😄❤️ and i think 90% foodies will prefer to take a quick hunger break here. I request those 10% to fill the gap sooner the better 🔥 🔥🔥

It is situated in the Atlantis mall Civil lines......Prayagraj...... 
You all are well aware of the fact that it is a place mostly crowded.... it promotes self service.... the menu is being displayed on the screen above counters.... very limited items are there in this mcD Allahabad...  but it will be freshly prepared and served hot.... drinking water is available for free but one have to ask for it..... its affordable...... one cannot have a cosy atmosphere or a silent atmosphere since its generally over crowded....

I recommend you to taste ice creams...

I would prefer KFC for burgers. But if u want something lite than you ho for it.
The place is always crowded. Try the mcflurry and allu ticki
